name: Composition 2.1
description: The Color Study series was a body of work made in 2010 by artist Tom Burtonwood. Working iteratively from a single template of blocks Burtonwood sought to explore formal properties of hue, value and saturation. Each work is painted on 8.5 x 11 inch paper using acrylic gouache. They are being minted on HEN as 1/1 editions. A book of all the Color Studies together plus an essay by media theorist Patrick Lichty is available msg me on twitter for more info @tburtonwood
